channel.title: RS2007 Clan
channel.description:
Hello everyone! I finally got the chance to play the RS2007 server, so I figured I would create this thread for a clan chat I created. You can do anything in this clan chat:
[ul][li]Discuss general game content[/li] [li]Organize community events[/li] [li]Discuss group activities, such as resource runs[/li] [li]Request items[/li] [li]Get help with things you are having a hard time with[/li][/ul]
If you are interested in participating in this, feel free to join the clan chat [b]Hoox[/b].

item.title: RS2007 Clan
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Hello everyone! I finally got the chance to play the RS2007 server, so I figured I would create this thread for a clan chat I created. You can do anything in this clan chat:
